desc: This Barbertrimmer™ is easy to hold and will be the only trimmer you will need your arsenal. The close-cutting, carbon-steel T-blade is perfect for lining, designing and dry trimming. This Baldheaded electric hair trimmer has a power rotary motor for increase speed and power and constant speed technology. Shop now!

layout.text: Ergonomic & luxurious design perfect for lining, designing and dry shaving
